name: agent-studio
description: Multi-platform agent configuration bundle for Claude Code, Cursor IDE, and Factory Droid

scripts.validate: node scripts/validate-config.mjs && node scripts/validate-model-names.mjs && pnpm index-rules
scripts.validate:all: node scripts/validate-config.mjs && node scripts/validate-model-names.mjs && node scripts/validate-workflow.mjs && node scripts/validate-all-references.mjs && pnpm index-rules
